name: Pokaboo
description:
Pokaboo is a simply haunting puzzle game in which you join blobs of the same color together.
As the ghost, you will work in increasingly challenging layouts to combine matching colors into abstract shapes from all around the board.

As you merge colors together successfully, that particular color will disappear, bringing you closer to level completion.

Starting simple, Pokaboo becomes more complex as the game introduces more colors and more complicated schemes to solve.

Tapping into both intuition and logic skills, you will need to complete 120 levels in all.

With colorfully eerie artwork and a myriad of minimal, ghostly tunes, Pokaboo's meditative and challenging gameplay will haunt your imagination.

Features:
• Unique and intuitive color-matching game
• 120 handcrafted levels across 6 beautiful worlds (more to come)
• Extensive replay value with the stars goal
• Pick up and play, pause at will, one handed portrait game
• Eerie and original soundtrack
• Universal UX, no text
